name: Old Town
description: The historical heart of Warsaw with castles, old streets and tourist attractions. Popular among tourists, which guarantees a stable income.

name: Palace of Culture and Science (Center)
description: Visiting card of Warsaw and one of the tallest buildings in Poland. The area attracts both tourists and local residents, which provides a high income.

name: Vilyanov
description: Luxurious area with the famous Wilan√≥w Palace. Prestigious and attractive for investment.

name: Prague-North
description: Creative district with artistic spaces and unusual architecture. Known for its color and historical buildings.

name: Zoliborz
description: Quiet green area with cozy cafes and parks. An ideal place for investment.

name: Mokotow
description: A large and densely populated area with developed infrastructure, offices and residential complexes. Stable and high income.

name: Ursus
description: Quiet suburban area with opportunities for industrial development and affordable housing.

name: Bialoleka
description: One of the fastest growing areas with lots of new construction and affordable housing. Excellent investment opportunity for beginners.

name: Bemowo
description: Commercial and business center with numerous office complexes. A promising area for investments.

name: Downtown
description: The central district of the city with skyscrapers, prestigious offices and tourist locations. The most profitable and at the same time difficult to capture district.
